channel.title: Allstarscape.org
channel.description:
Website: http://allstarscape.org Forums: http://allstarscape.org/site/ Webclient: http://allstarscape.org/w1.html Chat: http://allstarscape.org/frequently-asked-questions/index.html
~Welcome~ Welcome to Allstarscape a brand new fully working 718 runescape private server. Allstarscape offers you a great range of things, To find out what we have to offer please read below
~Features~ We have many features on Allstarscape such as new home, skills, PvP, minigames, all working items, highscores in-game and much much more. So why not start your quest with Allstarscape today?
~Screenshots~
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ywv1jt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/f0ysz5.png[/img]

item.title: Allstarscape.org
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:9, topic:519566”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=638031.msg4301219#msg4301219 date=1369024413]
Pretty sure there is another advertisement up for this.
[/quote]
I would have found it by now.

OT: Good luck, but I’d recommend adding more media to give more information to potential players. I like your website layout, as well.[/quote]Did a quick google search it was a .net with same domain sorry about that

[hr]

Edit: their site still looks familiar as hell though…

Read full topic

item.title: Allstarscape.org
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Loveandpower:

Pretty sure there is another advertisement up for this.

I would have found it by now.

OT: Good luck, but I’d recommend adding more media to give more information to potential players. I like your website layout, as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstarscape.org
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

I’m not arguing against you guys, yes the title is misleading, but he has every right to do so. He owns the domain and has used that name for his server.

Insert Nostalgic rant about this not being Allstar

Read full topic

item.title: Allstarscape.org
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Too bad the original owner won’t come back for it. So I’d suggest changing the title because as everyone else, I was thinking this was an actual Allstar but little did I know it was an impersonation per-say.

Anyway, I wish for the best of luck and the website needs to be fix. Also, I do love the homepage; it’s a great first impression.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstarscape.org
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I honestly was hoping it was an allstar lol

[hr]

Pretty sure there is another advertisement up for this.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstarscape.org

item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

The title is very misleading. People will think this is a 317 most likely.

item.description:

item.title: Allstarscape.org
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Your title is so misleading.

^ I agree.
I have an Allstar Source and it is COMPLETELY different. When I saw your title I thought I wouldn’t see anything like this.
